thread.title: Black Stone Minerals, L.P. Schedules Earnings Call for First Quarter of 2018; Announces Participation in Upcoming Investor Relations Events

author: cnbc.com
title: Black Stone Minerals, L.P. Schedules Earnings Call for First Quarter of 2018; Announces Participation in Upcoming Investor Relations Events
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Black Stone Minerals, L.P. (NYSE: BSM) (“Black Stone Minerals,” “BSM,” or “the Partnership”) today announces the date of its first quarter of 2018 earnings call. The Partnership is scheduled to release details regarding its results for the quarter after the close of trading on May 7, 2018. A conference call to discuss these results is scheduled for May 8, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. Central time (10:00 a.m. Eastern time). Dial-in information is provided below. A telephonic replay of the conference call will be available approximately two hours after the call through June 7, 2018.
Call Type
Phone Number
Conference ID
Domestic participant 1-877-447-4732 8485889 Domestic replay 1-855-859-2056 8485889 International participant 1-615-247-0077 8485889 International replay 1-404-537-3406 8485889 The conference call will be webcast live and can be accessed through the Investors section of BSM’s website at www.blackstoneminerals.com .
Members of management from Black Stone Minerals will also be participating in the following upcoming investor events:
2018 MLP & Energy Infrastructure Conference – May 23, 2018 in Orlando, Florida. Management will give a presentation, which will be available via webcast, and participate in investor meetings at this event. Canadian Investor Marketing – June 6, 2018 in Toronto, Canada. Management will be meeting with current and potential investors throughout the day. Stifel 2018 Cross Sector Insight Conference – June 11 to June 13, 2018 in Boston, Massachusetts. Management will give a presentation, which will be available via webcast, and participate in investor meetings at this event.
Links to the aforementioned webcasts as well as any updated presentation materials for these events will be made available in the Investor Relations section of the Black Stone Minerals website prior to the event.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180419006557/en/
Black Stone Minerals, L.P.
Brent Collins, (713) 445-3200
